Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 10 Mahantaraduka » 10.14 Upādinnaduka » 10.14.1 Paṭiccavāra » 10.14.1.1 Paccayānuloma » 10.14.1.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Mahantaraduka
Upādinnaduka
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayānuloma
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
419.
3382Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā ekaṃ, anantare dve, samanantare dve, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye pañca, upanissaye dve, purejāte dve, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme pañca, vipāke pañca, āhāre pañca, indriye pañca, jhāne pañca, magge pañca, sampayutte dve, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā pañca, natthiyā dve, vigate dve, avigate pañca.
<< 10.14.1.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāraup10.14.1.2 Paccayapaccanīya >>
